thread.title: Real Madrid whizz-kid Martin Odegaard victim of two red card challenges in three weeks on loan at Heerenveen
thread.title_full: Real Madrid whizz-kid Martin Odegaard victim of two red card challenges in three weeks on loan at Heerenveen

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Real Madrid whizz-kid Martin Odegaard victim of two red card challenges in three weeks on loan at Heerenveen
text:
Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Real Madrid wonderkid Martin Odegaard has seen himself the victim of two red card challenges in the space of three weeks. 
The 18-year-old is currently on loan at Dutch top tier side Heerenveen. 
Odegaard established himself as something of a sensation, breaking through at Stromsgodset at the age of 15. 
The teenager then made his international bow four months later, becoming Norway's youngest ever player. 
Six months on and Real Madrid snapped up the 16-year-old, fighting off competition from all corners of Europe. Odegaard is the victim of a stamp (Photo: IMG) 
But after only two-and-a-half seasons, Odegaard has found himself shipped out on loan to Eredivisie side Herenveen. 
And if Zinedine Zidane's plan was to toughen the 18-year-old up, it looks to be working. Odegaard receives a nasty challenge to the back of his leg (Photo: IMG) 
In the space of three weeks, Odegaard has been the victim of two separate straight red card challenges. 
The first came against Utrecht on February 5. After turning his marker, Odegaard is pulled down and stamped on for his troubles. Odegaard cries out in pain (Photo: IMG) 
The second challenge came against Roda on Saturday. Again, in a very similar part of the pitch, the Norwegian pips his marker to the ball before receiving a high-studded challenge to the back of the leg. 
Hopefully Odegaard can find inspiration in Cristiano Ronaldo and Gareth Bale who both toughened up in the Premier League before conquering La Liga with Real Madrid. poll loading Will Martin Odegaard become a Real Madrid star one day? 4000+ VOTES SO FAR
